original_text: It was because of one man, Adam, that sin came into the world. Death was the result of Adam's sin. Because of that, death came to all people, because everyone failed to obey God.
korean_text: 그러므로 한 사람으로 말미암아 죄가 세상에 들어오고 죄로 말미암아 사망이 들어왔나니 이와 같이 모든 사람이 죄를 지었으므로 사망이 모든 사람에게 이르렀느니라

sentences.original_text: It was because of one man, Adam
that sin came into the world
Death was the result of Adam's sin
because everyone failed to obey God
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 하나님께 순종하지 않았기 때문입니다
